name: POOP IN SPACE
description:
Critics are calling POOP IN SPACE the fecal frenzy event of the year. Squat down in that captain's chair and push through 3 levels of nostril-flaring, space-exploring bliss as you assume the role of a steamy hero with nothing left to lose. Can this young dopple of brown take King Clog to pound town, or will this dookie be damned to dance with the stars forever? I'm sure it'll be one hot wet mess you won't wanna miss.

Controls:

  • X-shoot/select
  • C-teledash
  • Z-shitstorm
  • F-pause
  • delete-return to main menu
  • resize window for optimal pooviewing

Music by Jason Shaw, EeL, and Fabian Measures

Programming and Art by JankyHank
